H0.text: after how many years are the olympic games held. Every 4 years

H1.text: after how many years are the olympic games held. Annually

H2.text: after how many years are the olympic games held. Every 5 years

H3.text: after how many years are the olympic games held. Once every two years

A4.text: The modern Olympics began in 1896. Since then, summer and winter games have usually celebrated a four-year period known as an Olympiad.

A5.text: Since 1994, summer and winter Games have been held in staggered even years.
